name: World of Dice.net
description:
the Dice wants to play twisted games. Try to survive my challenges and my power of randomness.

- Made with Godot 4-alpha 12
- Add your custom mp3 music to Music folder if you want to kick some ass.

Music recommendations:

  • Beasuce, Hyperdrive
  • Carpenter Brut, Roller Mobster
  • F777, Space Battle
  • Beasuce, Power Fantasy of Dark Gods
